build.beforeDevCommand: bash -lc 'if [ -f ../frontend/package.json ]; then npm --prefix ../frontend run dev -- --host; else npm --prefix ./frontend run dev -- --host; fi'
build.beforeBuildCommand: bash -lc 'if [ -f ../frontend/package.json ]; then npm --prefix ../frontend run build; else npm --prefix ./frontend run build; fi'

bundle.shortDescription: Track your peptide protocols, doses, and research
bundle.longDescription: PepTrack is a comprehensive desktop application for managing peptide protocols, tracking doses, researching scientific literature, and maintaining supplier information. All data is stored locally and encrypted on your device.
